categories: Category:Star Wars Droids: The Kalarba Adventures

nodes.text: Star Wars Droids: The Kalarba Adventures 6 is the sixth issue of Star Wars Droids: The Kalarba Adventures, a Dark Horse comic book series starring R2-D2 and C-3PO. It was published in September 1994 by Dark Horse Comics.

In the conclusion to the adventures of R2-D2 and C-3PO in the Kalarba system, a power core rupture on Hosk forces all life forms to be evacuated, but life forms doesn't include droids! As Olag Greck makes his final stand, R2-D2 and C-3PO race against time to save the industrial moon… but first they'll have to survive Greck's droid armada!
